dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Bill McMorris
dmca.body:
December 3, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

1. The copyrighted work at issue is in the text that appears on:
http://www.stories.vaty.net/2006/11/terrible-big-wing-in-abilene.html, futher identified by the notation, "Posted by Ron 2:14 p.m."

2. I, the undersigned, am the exclusive owner of the copyright in and to the short story, "The Terrible Big Wind in Abilene," first published in the October 1996 issue Boys Life Magazine, a publication of the Boy Scouts of America, located at 1325 West Walnut Hill Lane, P.O. Box 152079, Irving, TX 75015-2079. Publication was done with my permission on payment of a fee to me by Boys' Life for First Serial Rights, copyright reverting to me following publication.

3. Subsequent publication in the same magazine with the same fee and copyright arrangement took place in the October 2006 issue. Pages from from both issues of Boys' Life Magazine are enclosed to support my ownership.

4. Utilizing the search query "The Terrible Big Wind in Abilene," at www.google.com, the search result in pgh 1 above contains the material which infringes the exclusive rights of the owner.

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the infringing material.

I have good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

William B. McMorris
P.O. Box 2800
Ukiah, CA 95482
email: bill@pacific.net
